name: Button Group
description: A component for grouping buttons together.

name: Card
description: A component for displaying content in a card layout.

name: Drawer
description: A component for displaying a sliding panel.

name: Chip
description: A component for displaying small blocks of information.

name: Container
description: A component for constraining content width. `mx-auto` and `padding` is included by default.

name: Icon Button
description: A button component that only contains an icon. Extended version of the Button component. Also Button component can be used with `isIconOnly` prop.

name: List
description: A component for displaying a list of items.

name: Table
description: A component for displaying tabular data.
